document.full_text: the u.s. nuclear safety regulator said on wednesday it is conducting special inspections at two illinois nuclear plants operated by exelon corp to review the handling of two equipment issues.
document.title: nuclear regulator reviewing 2 illinois plants
lines_and_colors: the u.s. nuclear safety regulator said on wednesday it is conducting special inspections at two illinois nuclear plants operated by exelon corp to review the handling of two equipment issues.
